home.welcome1: Welcome til da dictionary at's by Shetlanders an fir Shetlanders!
home.welcome2: Help wis mak dis dictionary better bi addin yir voice til da wirds an expressions. An help wis bi addin ony wirds or expressions at's missin!
home.welcome3: W'ir mappin da wirds and expressions bi whaar d'ir spokken tae shaa a mair veeve pictir o Shaetlan speech.
home.welcome4: Tae start you aff, you can saerch fir a wird or phrase inna da saerch bar abün, or click on browse atidda menu to browse bi letter. If y'ir wantin tae help oot, click {here} tae register!
home.tutorial: Needin mair detail? Tak a skoit at wir tutorial

faq.heading: Aft Aksed Questions
faq.message1: Da Spaektionary wis maed bi {creator} and is maed up wi da lexical database maed aforehaand trowe da Shaetlan Project by {ihd}.
faq.message2: It sud be nottit at dis isna a dictionary o wirds at's exclusive and unique til Shaetlan. Herdly ony wirds is. As is wint tae be da wye fir ony language, Shaetlan shares a lok o wirds an expressions wi idder languages, espeecially dem at's clossly relatit til Shaetlan, or dem at Shaetlan is haed closs contact wi. In fact, de'r nae spoken language kent o idda wirld at døsna share vocabulary wi some idder language. In nae wye døs dis mak ony parteeklar language hae less wirt. Nidder døs it mean at dis wirds is less relevant fir yun parteeklar languages.
faq.message3: Da immediate ancestors o Shaetlan is Scots an Norn. Norn is extinct, but it descended fae wast Aald Norse. Scots is a macro language wi twartree varieties at's fairly different fae een anidder. Dey come fae Northumbrian Aald English. Standirt English, on da idder haand, comes fae Mercian Aald English. So Scots isna (an is nivver bøn) a dialect o English ony mair as English is (or wis bøn) a dialect o Scots. Firbye dat, Shaetlan is haed an aafil lok o contact wi da Low Country Germanic languages (Low German an Dutch), an, fir da hindmaist twartree centuries, wi Standirt English. Aa dis languages is clossly relatit an dey hae a lok o seemilarities atween dem. Bit dey irna identical. An d'ir aa affectit whit laek Shaetlan is come tae be. Fir mair aboot da history o Shaetlan, see {here}.
faq.message4: W'ir wint tae git questions laek dis eens:
faq.question1: Whit wye ir de English wirds inna da dictionary?
faq.answer1: Da wirds i dis dictionary is da eens at can be fun idda Shaetlan dictionaries listit apø wir {about} page, an in trowe da speech o da 20 Shetlanders idda Shetland Museum an Archives oral history interviews. Twartree wirds an dir spelleens will owerlap wi English, laek whin George Gear, Mary Manson, James Ritch, Harriet Sandison, etc spaeks aboot da sea, a ship, a parish, a piano, a pier, a ambulance, etc. But dey ir wirds fun in Shaetlan speech at ir gotten localised tae be øsed athin relevant Shaetlan speech, an so d'ir relevant fir da Shaetlan language.
faq.question2: Whit wye døen you spell English wirds da English wye?
faq.answer2p-1: Wirds laek plaess, airm, neest is Aald Scots wirds and so d'ir nae mair onnly fun in English as dey ir onnly fun in Scots. Dey wan intil da lexicon idda time o Aald English, an da varieties at cam fae Northumbrian Aald English, laek Scots, cam tae hae ee pronunciation an dey shaa dat, whaaras da descendent of Mercian Aald English (i.e. English), cam tae hae anidder at's mair influenced wi Norman French (fir mair aboot da history o Shaetlan, see {here}).
faq.answer2p-2: Ultimately plaess, fir example, gings back til da Latin platea, at's da origin o da Swedish plats 'place' firbye, an da Norwegian plass 'place' an aa. Nae localised spelleen is mair richt as ony idder, bit athin da Shetland context da English spelleen is da fameeliar een, fur English is come tae be whit bairns is ey bøn lairned wi athin sküls fir da last 200 year. Hoosumivver, da English spelleen døsna shaa da Shaetlan pronunciation (or da history o da wird) at cam here wi Scots lang afore English did. In idder wirds, dis kind o wirds dunna “belang” til English ony mair as dey “belang” til Swedish, Norwegian or Scots. D'ir jüst localised spelleens at's relevant til Shetland. Eence Shaetlan comes tae be øsed as a medium o instruction in da sküls, da spelleens relevant til Shetland'll come tae feel as hame-aboot as ony idder. Fir mair aboot da principles ahint wir spelleen system, see {here}
faq.question3: Shaetlan haes datn a lok o variation, whit wye can dat be pitten across athin ee single spelleen system?
faq.answer3: A group o islands laek Shetland is lippent tae hae linguistic variation. Hit wid be parteeklarly streinge if it didna (bit it's no da maist linguistically diverse plaess idda wirld, as some fokk maks it oot tae be noo an agein. Dat wid be Vanuatu, wi 138 mutually unintelligible languages, wi dir ain regional an social variation ati dem aa). Da maist impoartant thing aboot a spelleen system is at it døsna exactly transcribe da phonetics o speech, bit hit's a pragmatic wye o shaain whit's wint tae be da sam ower a speech community. In idder wirds, a spelleen system is ey a compromise an it nivver shaas da exact speech of ony ee single body. Dis means at a reader døsna hae tae ken da da wye a writer spaeks in oarder tae be able to mak oot da text: dis wye it alloos da text tae be understød aawye trowe da community. Dis is da caess wi English, at haes 77 varieties listit idda electronic {worldAtlasLink} (dis døsna hae in it da five varieties listit in {micronesia}. Fir example, da {dialectsArchive} haes mair as 1,600 voices fae 135 countries athin it. Yit aa dat voices gits da sam spelleen fir wirds laek water, light, rain, through, face, etc. Fir a mair in depth discussion aboot a spelleen system fir Shaetlan, see {here}.
faq.question4: Dis is a Scots wird, you can fin it aa ower da Scots spaekin plaesses, whit wye is it in a Shaetlan dictionary?
faq.answer4: As seid abün at da tap o dis page, dis isna a dictionary o wirds or expressions at's unique or exclusive til Shaetlan alein, bit a representative dictionary o Shaetlan speech, includin aa da wirds an expressions shared ower da Scots spaekin plaesses.
faq.answer5-p1: De could be twa reasons why you canna fin a parteeclar wird or expression athin Da Spaektionary:
faq.answer5-p2: (1) hit's spelt different fae yir first search attempt. Ee wye tae check dat is tae saerch fir da translation athin English.
faq.answer5-p4: In dat caess wir raelly wantin you tae add it til wir dictionary! Dis is whit da Spaektionary is aa aboot: tae keep biggin it up and makkin it better an mair comprehensive.
faq.answer6: Wis wirsels. We hae nae external or third pairty fundeen. W'ir døin dis i wir spare time. We dunna git ony peyment fir ony o wir ootpiteens, an aa of dat is freely avaelable trowe {ihd}

about.message1: Da {spaektionary} wis maed by {creator} and is maed wi da lexical database by {ihd} at dey hae trowe da Shaetlan Project. Da hoop fir dis dictionary is tae encourige ony spaekers (aa spaekers!) o Shaetlan to git stuck in wi improvin da dictionary wi baith soond recoardeens an example sentences. Firbye dat w'ir hoopin at users'll add wirds an expressions at irna alreidy idda dictionary, so it can be maed mair complete. W'ir hoopin tae map whit fokk submits so at we can mak a diagrams o whar athin Shetland whit wirds an pronunciations is fun da maist. Dis'll alloo fir a mair nuanced pictir o da veeve and characterfil Shaetlan language dan fokk is haed access til afore.
about.message2: Da database at da Spaektionary is biggit apün is maed up wi a corpus o da speech fae 20 oral history interviews by da Shetland Museum and Archives at wis døn idda 1980s an 1990s, released fir resaerch bi da kind permeession fae Dr. Brian Smith. Dis oral history corpus comes tae be 37.5 hours o speech (aboot 316,000 wirds). Da spaekers is fae different plaesses in Shetland, de'r 10 male an 10 female spaekers an d'ir aa 60 years aald or aalder at da time of recoardeen. Aa interviews wis transcribit bi Angus Johnson, at kindly released his transcriptions fir da øse ati dis project. Da database haes athin it da entries pitten tagidder fae da follooin publications an aa:
about.message3: Da code ahint it aa is oppen source an avaelable on {github}.
about.message4: See wir {faq} page fir mair information aboot da project.
about.message5: Fir mair aboot I Hear Dee and wha we ir, see {here}.

addWord.suggestedWordDesc: Pit in da new wird y'ir wantin tae add til da dictionary
addWord.englishLabel: Whit døs it mean in English?
addWord.exampleSentenceLabel: Can you gie a example sentence in Shaetlan?
addWord.wordType: Whit kind o wird is it? (Optional)
addWord.confirm: I agree I am ower blyde fir Da Spaektionary an I Hear Dee tae øse dis word in dis online dictionary, as weel as in idder media at a laetter daet.
addWord.thanks: Tanks! We'll tak a skoit at yir submission ower da neest twartree days.

word.reportAlert: Yir wird repoart wis successfil. We'll tak a skoit at it as shün as we can.
word.noResults: Sorry, we couldna fin ony wirds at matches whit yir saerched fir

comments.loggedIn: You hae tae be loggit in tae comment
comments.noComments: De'r nae comments avealable fir dis wird yit, be da first een tae add wan!
comments.login: Log in tae add a comment

recordings.successAlert: Recoardeen successfully addit! We'll review it an as lang as it's appropriate, we'll approve it!
recordings.pendingAlert: You hae a pendin recoardeen(s). We'll review it in due coorse! You can add anidder een below if you'd laek.
recordings.noRecordings: De'r nae recoardeens avaelable fir dis wird yit, be da first tae add een
recordings.addYourOwn: Add a recoardeen o yir ain
recordings.instruction1: Tae add yir ain recoardeen, jüst birse da Recoard button tae start, an da sam button agein tae stop. You'll be able tae hear back yir recoardeen afore submittin it.
recordings.instruction2: Yir recoardeen'll need tae be approved afore it'll shaa up on da site.
recordings.signUp: Sign up tae add a recoardeen
recordings.speaker: Spaeker

locations.loggedInAlert: You hae tae be loggit in tae add plaesses
locations.whereInShetland: Whar in Shetland is dis wird spokken?
locations.dataGathering: W'ir gadderin data an'll shaa a heatmap whin we git enoff information tae mak da data øsfil!
locations.previous: You ir pickit plaesses fir {word} afore. If you wid laek tae amend yir selection, please click {here}.
locations.successAlert: Tanks! Dis'll gie wis a haand finnin oot whar dis wird is seid idda isles

reporting.issueNature: Whit wye ir de a issue?

register.desc: Reigisterin wi Da Spaektionary alloos you tae add comments, recoardeens an plaesses til wirds idda dictionary
register.name: Naem
register.canContact: A'm blyde tae be tellt aboot ony new Spaektionary features

forgot.desc: Firyatten yir passwird? Nae budder. Jüst lat wis ken yir email address and we'll email you a passwird reset link at'll alloo you tae pick a new een.
